meanings.definition: Not presenting any difficulties or complications.
meanings.sent1: The straightforward math problem was unproblematic for the students.
meanings.sent2: The unproblematic task of watering the plants was quickly completed.
meanings.sent3: It was unproblematic to choose what to eat when the menu had only one option.
meanings.sent4: Her unproblematic solution to the issue was like a ray of sunshine in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The unproblematic nature of the puzzle made it enjoyable to solve.

meanings.definition: Not causing any problems or concerns.
meanings.sent1: The unproblematic flight arrived at its destination ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: The new software update proved to be unproblematic for most users.
meanings.sent3: His unproblematic excuse for being late was surprisingly creative.
meanings.sent4: The unproblematic relationship between the two countries was a model for diplomacy.
meanings.sent5: The unproblematic nature of the situation put everyone at ease.
